AuthorName.Title: [PDF] An Empirical Study of Proxy Contracts at the Ethereum Ecosystem Scale
AuthorName.Content: M Zhang, P Shukla, W Zhang, Z Zhang, P Agrawal…;The proxy design pattern separates data and code in smart contracts into proxy and logic contracts.
